item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (47 points | 7 comments)
2. Were RNNs all we needed? (214 points | 90 comments)
3. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (537 points | 379 comments)
4. The Heart of Unix (2018) (55 points | 14 comments)
5. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (197 points | 97 comments)
6. Update on Reflection-70B (22 points | 2 comments)
7. Tengine: Open-source web server, originated by Taobao, based on Nginx (18 points | 3 comments)
8. Serving 70B-scale LLMs efficiently on low-resource edge devices [pdf] (193 points | 50 comments)
9. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (694 points | 229 comments)
10. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
11. Image Editing with Gaussian Splatting (208 points | 54 comments)
12. HTTrack Website Copier (39 points | 8 comments)
13. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (80 points | 19 comments)
14. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (28 points | 10 comments)
15. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (161 points | 104 comments)
16. You Can't Opt-Out of A.I. Online (35 points | 31 comments)
17. Solving methane mysteries with satellite imagery (105 points | 19 comments)
18. US Dept of Energy announces $1.5B in electric grid improvements (80 points | 40 comments)
19. Biggest solar flare since 2017 erupts from sun and Earth is in the firing line (49 points | 10 comments)
20. I Solve Problems (talk at EuroBSDCon 2024) (45 points | 5 comments)
21. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (114 points | 106 comments)
22. Britain's last coal-fired power plant shuts down (31 points | 10 comments)
23. DOSBox-X: Enhanced Fork of DOSBox for Expanded DOS and Retro PC Support (19 points | 3 comments)
24. Why Gumroad Didn't Choose Htmx (243 points | 122 comments)
25. Google says it won't follow Amazon's lead with a return-to-office mandate (192 points | 172 comments)
26. Show HN: I made a super-simple image CDN (14 points | 6 comments)
27. Discussing the Neptunian desert, savanna, and ridge (20 points | 3 comments)
28. What Kind of Writer Is ChatGPT? (64 points | 45 comments)
29. Determinism in League of Legends: Implementation (2017) (88 points | 41 comments)
30. Modifications to GPU Hardware to Benefit Signed Distance Fields (59 points | 11 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
